text: Hi, I have a question can I have multiple privet apps in one project?
Or one hsproject can contain one private app?

Hi Roman, at moment this is not possible. This was brought up in another channel if you would like to see the discussion <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CLJJXGTC0/p1695770036826379|there>. Do you mind sharing more about what you are looking to do with multiple private apps?

Just to clarify: This isn't possible if multiple apps contain UI extensions (CRM cards). If only one app has UI extensions, you can have multiple in a project for other purposes. Here's a simple working project config that illustrates that.

Still very interested to hear about how/why you're organizing a project with multiple apps though :slightly_smiling_face:
They have to have different `name` and different `uid` to build successfully.
